hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
cp -r ${LINUX_GIT_DIR}/* $WORKSPACE
export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=/home/linuxregressionmac/flexlm/vector-UBUNTU.lic export VECTORCAST_DIR=$LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR
cd $WORKSPACE ./build.sh --gcov cd build ./install.sh lcov --zerocounters --directory `pwd` ./RunUnitTest.sh
cd $WORKSPACE mkdir tbuild1 cd tbuild1 cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ $VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcRunTests.py
cd $WORKSPACE mkdir tbuild2 cd tbuild2 cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ $VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcRunTests.py --metrics
cd $WORKSPACE mkdir tbuild3 cd tbuild3 cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ $VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcRunTests.py --cmdverb
cd $WORKSPACE mkdir coverage cd coverage lcov --capture --directory $WORKSPACE/build --output-file=$PWD/coverage.info #lcov --add --add-tracefile ../coverage1.info -a ../coverage2.info -o coverage_merged.info genhtml coverage.info
